QuestData.Title: The Direhorn Mother's Fury
QuestData.Description:
This one protects de faithful who still seek de shrine.
You will take your companion and show them de fury of a mother direhorn.
Trust in your young friend. She has always known how to fight.
Open de way. Slay de heretics that defile our loa's shrine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear a path to the Greater Wayshrine in the Antul'Mita Plateau.
